about_the_game:
about this game [/]
This is an experimental visual novel with a length of about 30-60 minutes. It tells a story of a female crossing.
You can browse the game with a reading attitude. From time to time, some options will pop up for you to choose. Each choice will affect the fate value of the hostess, which is related to different endings. Yes, there are he and be in this game. Although be is not so bad

————————————————————————————————————————————————————

Introduction to the plot

The hostess is a modern man who has crossed to Kyushu to become a princess.
The country is in the disaster of war. A huge conspiracy slowly approaches her. The gentle King's brother, the proud bird master, who she should believe and who is behind all the conspiracies.


There is no soundtrack for the story.

Thank you for reading my story.

name: 九州仙玉  Kyushu jade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:  Intel HD graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics:  Intel HD graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: On Board Sound
